attributes.action: Stop excess taxing the british citizens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Do something about these charges energy suppliers are putting on the uk public is disgusting.. Sort the british workers wages out every thing seems to go up in price except the folks wages..we are being left behind as a nation instead of paying job seekers allowance actually pay the workers who go out to work we get nothing at all and it is shocking and something needs doing now the country is on its knees and the goverment cant see it ........

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
